item.title: About Faithfulst3ward.com
item.description: About This Site This site serves as a place to document how I setup various projects. It is first and foremost for my notes, but if you have stumbled across it I hope you find it useful. About FaithfulSt3ward Christian Husband Father IT / Security Guy

item.title: Updating the Firmware on the Raspberry Pi 4
item.description: Getting Started The Raspberry Pi 4 shipped with a firmware version that wasn’t fully optimized, and as a result it was prone to thermal throttling when under heavy load. An updated firmware has since come out that fixes the issue, and it’s an easy upgrade as long as your running Raspberry Pi OS. I don’t run Raspberry Pi OS, so I keep a spare MicroSD card with it installed and occasionally check for updates.
